title: Saint Thomas, Plate 8 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
marks:
Signature and Inscription

LLC of the sheet, pri LLC of the image, in the print: [HG fecit]
description: man with curly hair and beard, looking at a book held in his PL hand, holding a staff with a spear tip in his PR hand; cliff behind man with sea over his PL shoulder, birds flying over water; text at bottom:  \"VII. / INDE VENTURUS EST, IVDICA- / RE VIVOS & MORTUOS.\"
creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
